title: The Decline of Grammar - italicization of "their"

content.question: The italicization of "their" in the fifth sentence suggests that

choices.label: writers of past eras labored under much different conditions than writers of "Sunday supplements" (third sentence)
the terms "hacks" and "bureaucrats" apply also to the writers of the materials mentioned in the last part of the third sentence
the terms "hacks" and "bureaucrats" are being used facetiously
the speaker has contempt for sweeping condemnations of writers of earlier eras

content.answer: the terms "hacks" and "bureaucrats" apply also to the writers of the materials mentioned in the last part of the third sentence
